Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class ActionHandlerCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.ActionHandler
      • it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.ActionHandlerCLI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewElement
    public class ActionHandlerCLI
extends ActionHandler
    This class extends ActionHandler and is dedicated to managing actions on clients side, in case the user chose a CLI based display.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseAction

        public void chooseAction​(java.util.List<RemoteAction> options)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a list of possible actions and displays them to the user. Calls the other methods to make sure a notification is provided to the server once a choice has been taken by the user.
        Specified by:
        chooseAction in class ActionHandler
        Parameters:
        options - Is the list of actions available the user can choose from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateActionData

        public void updateActionData​(RemoteAction.Data data)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Updates the remote action with the choices of the user. If a state without legal continuation is entered, a rollback is automatically called.
        Specified by:
        updateActionData in class ActionHandler
        Parameters:
        data - Choices of the user regarding the action previously selected
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
